name: Muta-ball
description:
Made for the DJam 5!

It's a game where you play as a slippery ball and bounce against enemies and bumpers amid traps! Getting hurt mutates you, and if you mutate 3 times ... you die!

The game uses mouse controls only, clicking LMB makes you dash faster :D

If you play the game, please drop the time you got in the comments below! We'd like to see what the best times are :)
